sys_script.name: Needit When needed set date

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_58872_needit_needit</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Needit When needed set date</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
if (!current.u_when_needed.hasDate())
{
    gs.addErrorMessage("No date set.");
  var weekFromNow = new GlideDateTime();
weekFromNow.addDaysLocalTime(7);

current.u_when_needed = weekFromNow;
}
else
{
   gs.addErrorMessage("Date set.");
}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-06 07:09:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2110513a2f525110039955f62799b6e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Needit When needed set date</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2110513a2f525110039955f62799b6e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-06 07:36:15</sys_updated_on><template>u_when_needed=2022-11-01 00:00:00^EQ</template><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2110513a2f525110039955f62799b6e9"/></record_update>
